methods.name: glm::leftHanded
methods.parameters: const glm::vec3 &tangent=P, const glm::vec3 &binormal=P, const glm::vec3 &normal=P
methods.short: Return if a trihedron left handed or not. From GLM_GTX_handed_coordinate_space extension.

methods.parameters: const glm::vec3 &tangent=P, const glm::vec3 &binormal=P, const glm::vec3 &normal=P
methods.short: Return if a trihedron right handed or not. From GLM_GTX_handed_coordinate_space extension.
